projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: 2D Top-Down RPG game with cultivation theme featuring complex gameplay and diverse cultivation systems

features.cultivation: Cultivation system with 7 stats: Morality, Root Bone, Spirit Root, Comprehension, Fortune, Talent, Cultivation Quality
features.inventory: Inventory & Equipment system with drag & drop, asynchronous resource loading
features.combat: Real-time combat system with event-driven architecture and critical hit mechanism
features.playerManagement: Player management system using Singleton pattern and JSON serialization
features.ui: UI system with drag & drop and real-time stat updates
features.eventBus: Custom Event Bus system supporting decoupled communication

achievements.architecture: Completed entire event-driven architecture with over 50 types of events
achievements.cultivationSystem: Developed cultivation system that calculates derived stats
achievements.inventorySystem: Developed drag & drop inventory and equipment system
achievements.optimization: Optimized performance through caching, asynchronous loading and memory management
achievements.toolEditor: Created Tool Editor for debugging and game data management
